content: Hypocrisy is about the only thing the right is good at. If they stopped denying reality and employing double standards then what would they have left. They would have to treat Americans as equal under the law (no more preventing non whites from voting), they would have to acknowledge climate change, they would have to give up racist behaviour and scapegoating, they would have to give up on alternative facts. If all that happens then the earth will be destroyed by the Devil, because Life, Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness is actually unamerican and will not be tolerated no matter what the cost.
